channel.title: Abouts on Amiga blog
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Amiga blog

item.title: Who am I and what is this?
item.description: I’m Chris Beeley and I’m a data scientist. You can find my GitHub here and my team’s GitHub here. I’ve returned to the Amiga after a long absence and will be explaining the modern Amiga scene (to the best of my ability) and chronicling my quest to write Space Invaders in AMOS (Amiga BASIC, essentially). Come say hi on Twitter if you like, if you like Amigas I’m sure we’ll get on great, or even if you don’t come say hi anyway.
item.content:
I’m Chris Beeley and I’m a data scientist. You can find my GitHub here and my team’s GitHub here.

I’ve returned to the Amiga after a long absence and will be explaining the modern Amiga scene (to the best of my ability) and chronicling my quest to write Space Invaders in AMOS (Amiga BASIC, essentially).

Come say hi on Twitter if you like, if you like Amigas I’m sure we’ll get on great, or even if you don’t come say hi anyway.
